Description:
Mark +1 per charge. In addition to this, upon reaching 2 charges, damaging an enemy applies Mark on them.
Upon reaching 3 charges, damaging an enemy also applies Mark on target sides.
DescriptionExtended:
Mark +1 per charge.
In addition to this, upon reaching 2 charges, damaging an enemy applies Mark on them.
Upon reaching 3 charges, damaging an enemy also applies Mark on target sides.
Maximum charges 3. Can't be purged unless specified.
